item.title: Style Adaptation and Uncertainty Estimation for Multi-Source Blended-Target Domain Adaptation
item.description: SAUE: A novel multi-source blended-target domain adaptation approach using style adaptation and uncertainty estimation to improve model robustness and accuracy.
